VNormalizedBlackbody - Class in org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra
This class describes a blackbody spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
VNormalizedBlackbody(double, double) - Constructor for class org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra.VNormalizedBlackbody
Sets the temperature of the blackbody and the the V magnitude used for the normalization to the given values.
VNormalizedPowerLaw - Class in org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra
This class describes a power law spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
VNormalizedPowerLaw(double, double) - Constructor for class org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra.VNormalizedPowerLaw
Sets the index of the power law and the the V magnitude used for the normalization to the given values.
VNormalizedUserSuppliedSpectrum - Class in org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra
This class describes a blackbody spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
VNormalizedUserSuppliedSpectrum(URL, double) - Constructor for class org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra.VNormalizedUserSuppliedSpectrum
Sets the URL for the user-supplied data and the V magnitude used for the normalization to the given values.
